ygData.subject: Re: wake up!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Everybody wants a enchanter of lvl 29 or higher in there group cuz with clarity going  downtime is cut by 1/3  and i dont know about you but i hate staring at
ygData.messageBody:
Everybody wants a enchanter of lvl 29 or higher in there group cuz with
clarity going downtime is cut by 1/3 and i dont know about you but i hate
staring at my spellbook for 10 minutes at a time also a Clarity casting
enchanter along with a lvl 32 bard singing the mana song is truly a sight to
behold.

Tombor Fuzzyfootstomper
30 Druid E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: kale eusi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 10:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] wake up!!


> Speaking from personal experience, clarity is asked for quite often by
other
> spell casters including hybrids. I don't know for sure how useful it is at
> higher levels, but I can say that clarity has thus far been a a major boon
> from level 20 to 32.
>
> As to finding groups at higher levels, if you're in the right places,
> finding a group about your current level is easily done. In fact, I've
found
> that it's easier getting a group by not being set /role or /anon unless
you
> wish to either roleplay or be left alone. Hope you find this info useful.
> Good hunting!
>
>
> >From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
> >Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> >To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EverQuest] wake up!!
> >Date: Fri, 7 Jan 2000 12:31:18 -0500
> >
> >I agree that the list has died, but anyways I got a question for all you
> >enchanters out there...
> >I am halfway into 28, would have hit 29 but I am cautious and I like to
> >play
> >around (all guards except highpass hate my 24 illusions... hehe).... How
> >often do people ask you for clarity? and how hard would it be to get a
> >group
> >after achieving 29? and last.... do you recommend going /anon or /role?
> >Thanks in advance...
> >
> >--
> >Fabno Licious, 28th Erudite Enchanter, EMarr
> >
>
